entry.title: Maker, Make Me; Taker, Take It All
entry.summary:
Author: WinnieOnline

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,863Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 14

Summary: Timothy Drake was born to a Merchant family in District 12, like many before him. Born to Janet and Jack Drake,10 minutes after his sister Cassandra.For all his life he knew, he was liked well enough by his father, tolerated by his mother and loved by his sister. And as long as he had his sister, everything would be okay.--Jason was snapped out of his stupor at the desperate cry, the first volunteer since Mary Grayson, in the 55th Games.Then he caught sight of the boy who’d caused such a scene. He’d known by the name but hoped desperately, impossibly, that he was wrong.He wasn’t.It was him. The boy with the bread.

entry.title: A Nightingale's Song
entry.summary:
Author: SunflowerSky22

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,649Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 6

Summary: When Kathy Jones was fourteen years old, she lost her best friend Jason Todd in a drunk driving accident. Eight years later, Kathy finds herself in a Gotham that had gone quiet. Whispers spreading that someone had taken control of the the Black Mask's associates and grabbing his territory. While the Batman and his associates try to look for answers, and Tim Drake readjusts to being a hero after years away from the field, the young hacker isn't waiting around for them to find those answers. Kathy, in the pursuit of information regarding this Red Hood figure, finds herself caught up in something she would have never imagined. In turn, finding something-someone-she had thought she lost.Or, we all have ghosts from our past, but no one actually expects those ghosts to walk out of the grave and into their house with guns blazing.

entry.title: I Need You Like The Day Is Long
entry.summary:
Author: WinnieOnline

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,067Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 19

Summary: When it happens the first time, there’s no one else to blame. No pollen or drug, no alcohol or magic spell.It’s just Dick and Tim.Batman and Robin.--He’s smaller than he used to be, or maybe he just looks that way. His blue eyes aren’t as focused as they should be, they seem more sunken into his face. His skin is pale, his body is tall, like it used to be, but the bulk of muscle isn’t what it used to be. Maybe he was always this size. Maybe Jason’s just gotten bigger. Maybe Dick was telling the truth.The blade clatters to the ground, a shaky gasp and hands cupping his face and he knows.Dick was telling the truth.

entry.title: Suneater
entry.summary:
Author: deepwinterstrawberry

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 211,522Chapters: 40/90Kudos: 78

Summary: Two years after graduating high school, Jason is eight inches taller, mentally and physically ill in a dozen new ways, and newly insecure in his ability to understand people. Now he and Cass are finally starting college and impossibly, things are somehow going well. Best of all, they’ve made two incredible friends: bombastic, warmhearted Stephanie Brown and her shy, sharp shadow, Tim Drake. College is still full of challenges, and not just the rigorous academic standards Jason holds himself to. For starters, people won’t stop telling Jason that his new best friend has the hots for him. That audacious, horny loser Conner Fucking Kent keeps trying to infect his insides. Burnside College’s self-appointed protector, the scrappy vigilante Spoiler, keeps bumping into him. And of course, his body and brain are fucked up in ways that he’s somehow still discovering. It’s enough to make anyone want to run the fuck for the hills. Because Jason isn’t a coward, but he also isn’t an obnoxious asshole anymore; he isn’t a feisty, irrepressible little spitfire anymore; he isn’t the whip-smart top of his class anymore—and what does that even leave? Who the hell is he now, anyway?

entry.title: First Kontact
entry.summary:
Author: Chiyana

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 215,728Chapters: 30/?Kudos: 655

Summary: Two years after a disastrous first encounter with an alien entity called Necros, Captain Tim Drake is given his first mission back in the field. The simple six-month exploration mission babysitting a group of LexCorp researchers goes abruptly downhill upon the discovery of a missing colony ship, landing Tim directly back into the horror that took him out of the field in the first place and leading him to his second first encounter with an alien race. Usually he's all for over-achieving, but even he finds this to be a bit excessive.At least this time one of the aliens is more interested in him alive than dead.
